channel.title: Paying rs2 for rsca scripts
channel.description:
hi im looking for a couple scripts i would like made for me. The game is located at http://www.rscangel.org/ I would like a karamja harpoon fisher that will fish a full load of tuna and swordies then walk to general store and sell em, also needs to click the sleeping bag and just wait till i type the word in then start over And I wouldlike it to have a draynor banking function. [URL=http://img19.imageshack.us/my.php?image=93819046.png][IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/4489/93819046.png[/img][/URL]
The second script i would like is a iron miner that will bank and sleep. and a smither for it aswell. In return you will recieve this [URL=http://google.com][IMG]http://www.google.com[/img][/URL]
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] No buying/selling/trading runescape accounts. However buying scar scripts is fine.[/center]

item.title: Paying rs2 for rsca scripts
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

You are allowed to buy/sell scar scripts here but not sell/trade runescape accounts. Read the rules.

Read full topic
